titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University. MS Or 41: Sabʻ samawāt li-sirr samāʼī.

availability.licence: These images and the content of Rare Book and Manuscript Library MS Or 41: Sabʻ samawāt li-sirr samāʼī. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. msContents.summary: Copy of an astrology text for divination. Includes a number of tables.

author.persName: Fārūqī, Fatḥ Allāh ibn Muṣṭafá ibn ʻAbd al-Shakūr, active approximately 16th century-17th century
فاروقى، فتح الله بن مصطفى بن عبد الشکور،

supportDesc.extent: 86 foliated leaves : 235 x 155 (200 x 110) mm, bound to 245 x 160 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Contemporary Hindu-Arabic foliation in ink, upper center recto, catchwords every verso, lower left.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in rapid nastaʻliq in black ink; pointed.

binding.p: Half binding of red leather with marbled paper sides (red, blue, black, white).

origin.p: Copy dated 1011 AH (f. 86v); likely copied in India.
